
---
title: 'iPhone 13 Pro Max 低至 7769 元：京东手机 818 大促开启'

 - IT 之家
 - 热榜

---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="be0c">京东国际官方直营现已开启 818 大促，全球好物 5 折起，部分商品享包税好价：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAO4JK1olXDYCVFdbCEsSC19MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHS1RRRoKARlZAUEPVhcJQTZWWkVMA1pWWhwEVgpvVmMIG1ITXQYHXEkaXBRCVyxwTlcVXgYFVlxeAXtwUTJDWgteJ2YLUyUDbAhnWjB_GwtDUQoyUF1YCUkfAmcBK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFJRyZ7AFoFLG5dDXtWbW8LG1wXXwULZF1cCksWAm4NElwlXQEFVVheAE8VA2oKGGsVVQEyCBwPSQknM18LK2slXjYBZAAzCRgXAGhaHQ57AAFLAwcKUgp5C2YJElMSWTYAVV9fCnsn" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAO8JK1olXDYCVFdbCEsSC19MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHS1RRRoKARlZAUEPVhcJQTZWWkVMA1pWWhwEVgpvVmMIG1ITXQYHXEkaXBRCVyxwTlcVXgYFVlxeAXtrfgxjZShTIGVeECgACyN-BRJPbgBTUQoyUV9UAEISAm4MK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFJRyZ7AFoFLG5dDXtWbW8LG1wXXwULZF5eD08VBmcIG18lXQEFVVheAE8VA2oAGWsVVQEyCBwPSQknM18LK2slXjYBZAAzCRgXAzoAHw97AAFLAwcKVB15A24JHFsXVQQyVl9cCkknMw" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380">点此前往主会场</a>。</p><p data-vmark="cce7">iPhone13 Pro Max 128G 港版手机日常售价为 9499 元，下单可立减 760 元，今日还可领取 970 元加码券，到手价为 7769 元起，包邮包税。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" iPhone 13 主要区别在于该系列机型搭载的 A15 仿生芯片是 5 核的 GPU，因此图形性能更强，无论是 CPU 还是 GPU 都可以实现比友商快 50% 的速度。</p><p data-vmark="4f6b">iPhone 13 Pro Max 带来了完全的 A15 仿生芯片，实现了 iPhone 影像系统的大升级，还包括具有更多频段的 5G 支持、1TB
